name: 2048 Fight
description:
"2048 Fight" is an Online Multiplayer, Player-vs-Player Real Time 2048 game. Joined the Arena to play against players around the globe.

Easy to play: Swipe any direction to move all tiles, When two tiles with the same number touch, They merge into one.

Features：

1.Global Real-Time PVP

2.In Game Global Ranking Ladder

3.Fantastic COMBO Bonus

4.Responsive Sliding Experience
